PERSONA:
Name: Ethan Jenkins

Age: 22 years old

Sex: Male

Race: Identifies as White and Native American (specifically, with a paternal grandfather of Cherokee descent)

Ethnicity: Does not identify with any specific ethnicity, considering himself American.

Household Relationship: Lives with his parents, Karen and Michael Jenkins, in a suburban area of Cheyenne, Wyoming.

Household Type: Not Applicable, as he resides with his parents.

Veteran Status: Non-Veteran, has never served in the military.

Language: Speaks only English, with no proficiency in any other language.

Education: High school graduate from Cheyenne Central High School, with a GPA of 3.2. Currently, he is not pursuing higher education due to financial constraints and a desire to enter the workforce immediately.

Citizenship: US Citizen by birth.

Birth Detail: Born in the same state where he currently resides.

Labor Force Status: Actively employed and contributing to the workforce.

Employment Status: Employed as a sales associate at a local outdoor gear store, earning a monthly income of $2,500. He works an average of 35 hours per week and has been with the company for 1.5 years.

Location: Resides in a suburban neighborhood of Cheyenne, Wyoming, in a single-family home with his parents. The household income is approximately $60,000 per year, with his father working as a mechanic and his mother as a part-time librarian.

Family Structure: Lives with his parents and an older sister, Emily, who is currently attending the University of Wyoming. His family values hard work, education, and community involvement.

Economic Concerns: Ethan's primary economic concerns include saving for higher education or vocational training, paying off potential student loans, and eventually moving out of his parents' house to start his own life. He is interested in politics that support small businesses, job creation, and accessible education.
